attributes.action: Stop The Driving Vehicle Licencing Authority "DVLA", from giving Driver"s Vehicle Licencing Number Plate details to Companies Until Written Confirmation from the Vehicle Owner has Been Approved
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the Driving Vehicle Licencing Authority "DVLA", from giving out confidential Driver"s Vehicle Number Plate details to Companies , until Written Confirmation , giving permission has been sought from the Vehicle Owner.
